explains: adj. 双重的；两倍的；双折的

sentences.en: Using the pseudonyms has a two-fold purpose.
sentences.cn: 她们使用假名有着双重的目的。

sentences.en: The goal of the dashboard project was two-fold
sentences.cn: 此仪表板项目的目标有两个方面

sentences.en: Briefly, the objectives of the tool are two-fold.
sentences.cn: 简而言之，该工具的目标有两部分。
